title: Adobe AdCloud Search Keyword Performance Report Full Extension
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Keyword Performance Report Full Extension. Contains all Solution added fields.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Network Term identifier associated with this this click event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Internal Advertiser or User ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Advertiser or User Identifier associated with this click event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Ad Cloud Search Engine Identifier associated with this click event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Search Term or Keyword Name that generated the click.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Match Type associated to the Keyword being targeted for the Ad.
